# updateVisibleMenu(_:)

**Instance Method**

Updates the currently visible menu.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func updateVisibleMenu(_ block: (UIMenu) -> UIMenu)
```

## Parameters

- **block**: A mutable copy of the menu.

## Managing menu interactions

- **dismissMenu()**: Dismisses the context menu.
title: updateVisibleMenu(_:)
